/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the center of the frame, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The street itself is mostly empty, save for a few cars and pedestrians, adding a sense of tranquility to the otherwise busy cityscape. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting beautifully with the green of the trees and the various hues of the buildings. The perspective of the image gives a sense of depth and scale, highlighting the vastness of the city and the smallness of the individual elements within it.
